verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David חַלְּצֵ֣נִי <S%H2502><s%> Deliver יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD מֵאָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> man רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> from the evil מֵאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חֲמָסִ֣ים <S%H2555><s%> me from the violent תִּנְצְרֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5341><s%> preserve

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Who חָשְׁב֣וּ <S%H2803><s%> Which imagine רָע֣וֹת <S%H7451><s%> mischiefs בְּלֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> in [their] heart כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner י֝֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> continually יָג֥וּרוּ <S%H1481><s%> are they gathered together מִלְחָמֽוֹת׃ <S%H4421><s%> [for] war

שָֽׁנֲנ֣וּ <S%H8150><s%> They have sharpened לְשׁוֹנָם֮ <S%H3956><s%> their tongues כְּֽמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> as נָ֫חָ֥שׁ <S%H5175><s%> like a serpent חֲמַ֥ת <S%H2534><s%> poison עַכְשׁ֑וּב <S%H5919><s%> adders' תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> is under שְׂפָתֵ֣ימוֹ <S%H8193><s%> [is] under their lips סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

שָׁמְרֵ֤נִי <S%H8104><s%> Keep יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD מִ֘ידֵ֤י <S%H3027><s%> from the hands רָשָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked מֵאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חֲמָסִ֣ים <S%H2555><s%> me from the violent תִּנְצְרֵ֑נִי <S%H5341><s%> preserve אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Who חָ֝שְׁב֗וּ <S%H2803><s%> who have purposed לִדְח֥וֹת <S%H1760><s%> to overthrow פְּעָמָֽי׃ <S%H6471><s%> my goings

טָֽמְנֽוּ־ <S%H2934><s%> have hid גֵאִ֨ים ׀ <S%H1343><s%> The proud פַּ֡ח <S%H6341><s%> a snare לִ֗י וַחֲבָלִ֗ים <S%H2256><s%> for me and cords פָּ֣רְשׂוּ <S%H6566><s%> they have spread רֶ֭שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> a net לְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by מַעְגָּ֑ל <S%H4570><s%> the wayside מֹקְשִׁ֖ים <S%H4170><s%> gins שָֽׁתוּ־ <S%H7896><s%> they have set לִ֣י סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> for me Selah

אָמַ֣רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said לַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֵ֣לִי <S%H410><s%> Thou [art] my God אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <S%H238><s%> hear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <S%H8469><s%> of my supplications

יְהֹוִ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> O GOD אֲ֭דֹנָי <S%H136><s%> the Lord עֹ֣ז <S%H5797><s%> the strength יְשׁוּעָתִ֑י <S%H3444><s%> of my salvation סַכֹּ֥תָה <S%H5526><s%> thou hast covered לְ֝רֹאשִׁ֗י <S%H7218><s%> my head בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day נָֽשֶׁק׃ <S%H5402><s%> of battle

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Grant יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> not O LORD מַאֲוַיֵּ֣י <S%H3970><s%> the desires רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked זְמָמ֥וֹ <S%H2162><s%> not his wicked device אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּ֝פֵ֗ק <S%H6329><s%> further יָר֥וּמוּ <S%H7311><s%> [lest] they exalt סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> themselves Selah

רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [As for] the head מְסִבָּ֑י <S%H4524><s%> of those that compass me about עֲמַ֖ל <S%H5999><s%> let the mischief שְׂפָתֵ֣ימוֹ <S%H8193><s%> of their own lips [יְכַסּוּמֹו כ] (יְכַסֵּֽמֹו <S%H3680><s%> clad self ק)

[יָמִיטוּ כ] (יִמֹּ֥וטוּ <S%H4131><s%> be carried ק) עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> and גֶּֽחָ֫לִ֥ים <S%H1513><s%> Let burning coals בָּאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> into the fire יַפִּלֵ֑ם <S%H5307><s%> upon them let them be cast בְּ֝מַהֲמֹר֗וֹת <S%H4113><s%> into deep pits בַּֽל־ <S%H1077><s%> cannot יָקֽוּמוּ׃ <S%H6965><s%> that they rise not up again

אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man לָשׁוֹן֮ <S%H3956><s%> babbler בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest יִכּ֪וֹן <S%H3559><s%> be established בָּ֫אָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man חָמָ֥ס <S%H2555><s%> the violent רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> evil יְ֝צוּדֶ֗נּוּ <S%H6679><s%> shall hunt לְמַדְחֵפֹֽת׃ <S%H4073><s%> to overthrow

[יָדַעְתָּ כ] (יָדַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge ק) כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> will maintain יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD דִּ֣ין <S%H1779><s%> the cause עָנִ֑י <S%H6041><s%> of the afflicted מִ֝שְׁפַּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> [and] the right אֶבְיֹנִֽים׃ <S%H34><s%> of the poor

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> Surely צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> Surely the righteous יוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> shall give thanks לִשְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> unto thy name יֵשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> shall dwell יְ֝שָׁרִ֗ים <S%H3477><s%> the upright אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> in thy presence
